SEARCH
Package othellogame.ui.view

Class OfflinePlayingMainView

java.lang.Object
othellogame.ui.view.OfflinePlayingMainView
public class OfflinePlayingMainView extends Object
Represents the controller for the OfflinePlayingMainScene FXML file in the Othello game application.

It handles the main playing scene, player information, game announcements, and user interactions.

Follows the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern.

Version:
1.0, 12/07/2023
Author:
Dinh Thuy Nhat Vy
See Also:
  • Board

  • Mark

  • Method Details

    • loadOfflinePlayingMainScene

      public void loadOfflinePlayingMainScene(javafx.scene.layout.Pane currentPane)
      Loads the OfflinePlayingMainScene FXML file and initializes the necessary components.
      Parameters:
      currentPane - the current pane from which the OfflinePlayingMainScene is loaded.

    • updatePlayersInfo

      private void updatePlayersInfo()
      Updates player information. This method retrieves the avatars and usernames of the 2 players participating in the offline Othello game and displays this information on the user interface.

    • onInstructionsClick

      private void onInstructionsClick()
      Handles the click event for the "Game Instructions" button.

    • updateCurrentPlayerAnnouncement

      public void updateCurrentPlayerAnnouncement(Mark mark, String name)
      Updates the current player announcement.
      Parameters:
      mark - the mark of the current player.
      name - the name of the current player.

    • handleMove

      private void handleMove(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Handles the mouse click event on the game board for making moves.
      Parameters:
      e - the MouseEvent triggered by the player.

    • updateCurrentMoveAnnouncement

      public void updateCurrentMoveAnnouncement(boolean validMove, String name, Mark mark, int index)
      Updates the announcement box with the details of the current move.
      Parameters:
      validMove - true if the move is valid, false otherwise.
      name - the name of the player making the move.
      mark - the mark of the player making the move.
      index - the index of the move on the game board.

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard(boolean addDisc, Mark mark, int index)
      Updates the game board with the latest move.
      Parameters:
      addDisc - true if a new disc is added, false if an existing disc is flipped.
      mark - the mark (BLACK or WHITE) associated with the disc being added or flipped.
      index - the index on the game board where the disc is added or flipped.

    • onQuitClick

      private void onQuitClick()
      Handles the click event for the quit button, prompting a confirmation dialog.

    • onCloseIconClick

      private void onCloseIconClick()
      Handles the click event for the close icon on the leave match confirmation dialog.

    • onYesBtnClick

      private void onYesBtnClick()
      Handles the click event for the yes button on the leave match confirmation dialog.

    • gameSoundControl

      public void gameSoundControl()
      Controls the game sound, toggling between on and off states.
